tool_description: Predicts player churn risk using machine learning models based on player features, engagement history, and behavioral indicators, providing risk scores and intervention recommendations.

player_features.description: Player feature data for churn prediction

historical_churn_data.description: Historical data of players who churned

prediction_model.description: Model type: logistic_regression, random_forest, or neural_network

feature_importance.description: Whether to include feature importance analysis

prediction_window.description: Days ahead to predict churn risk

error_messages: Empty player features: At least one player feature record required for prediction.
Empty historical data: Historical churn data required to train prediction model.
Invalid prediction model: Must be one of [logistic_regression, random_forest, neural_network].
Invalid risk threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 0.9.
Invalid prediction window: Must be between 1 and 30 days.
Insufficient training data: Need at least 100 historical churn examples for reliable predictions.
usage: Provide player_features and historical_churn_data. Select prediction_model and configure risk_threshold, feature_importance, and prediction_window. Returns churn risk scores and actionable insights.

model_accuracy.description: Accuracy score of the prediction model

feature_importance_scores.description: Importance scores for each feature used in prediction
